column4: U.S. regulators give Amazon go-ahead for drone tests

column4: German watchdog slaps 3.25 million euro fine on BlackRock
column5: FRANKFURT German financial market watchdog Bafin has imposed a 3.25 million euro ($3.47 million) fine - the regulator's largest ever - on investment manager BlackRock for publishing faulty corporate voting rights disclosures.

column5: NEW YORK  March 20 The children of the comedian James McNair  who was killed in a  highway crash that injured fellow comic Tracy Morgan  have reached a $10 million out-of-court-settlement with Wal-Mart Stores Inc  according to court documents.

column4: Wal-Mart reaches settlement with children of comedian killed in crash
column5: The children of the comedian James McNair  who was killed in a  highway crash that injured fellow comic Tracy Morgan  have reached a settlement with Wal-Mart  the company confirmed on Friday.

column4: UPDATE 1-Wal-Mart reaches settlement with children of comedian killed in crash
column5: March 20 The children of the comedian James McNair  who was killed in a  highway crash that injured fellow comic Tracy Morgan  have reached a settlement with Wal-Mart   the company confirmed on Friday.

column4: Children of comedian killed in crash with Wal-Mart truck win $10 mln settlment-AP
column5: March 20 The children of the comedian James McNair  who was killed in a  road crash that injured fellow comic Tracy Morgan  won a $10 million settlement with Wal-Mart   according to the Associated Press  citing documents filed in New York's Westchester County.
